column1: and Weatherald starts with a boundary, rocks back and dispatches this short of length delivery to the deep midwicket boundary
short again but quicker this time, pulled straight back towards the bowler
length ball at the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball on the pads, gets away with it. Tucked away towards square leg
gives himself some room and looks to go over extra cover, misses
fuller on the toes, clipped to the left of square leg
tossed up at the stumps, and smashed over square leg, dribbles over the boundary line
arm ball this time, curving away, pushed towards extra cover
flatter outside off, smashes it towards long-on for a couple. A direct-hit from Cooper at the bowler's end. Weatherald put in the dive but he would have made it either way
fuller in the slot and slapped over midwicket, all the way for a six this time. Nabi taking some time to adjust
fuller around off, smashed but cannot get past mid-off
slower in the air, looks to drop on the off side and run but the keeper is quick to the ball
fuller and wider and Weatherald throws his bat at it, over backward point for four
length but ample room once again, smashed past point for four more
length ball at the batsman, comes slower off the wicket. Weatherald was shaping to pull it away but is cramped. Ends up lobbing it over short fine for a couple
fuller around off, and lofted over mid-off, Weatherald didn't try to hit it too hard but still had enough on it to carry all the way
much better, length ball at the body, pulled towards deep-backward square leg
length ball around off, pushed towards cover for a quick single
fuller around off, Salt brings the bottom hand into play and smashes it between the bowler and mid-off

in the slot once again, Salt goes midwicket and looks like he has got enough here. But Cooper keeps his calm near the boundary. A couple of steps back, pouches it just inside, lobs it in the air before stepping out before coming back and collecting it comfortably
length ball outside off, punches it behind point for one

length ball outside off, looks to smash towards midwicket, gets an inside edge that misses the stumps. Patel at short fine leg had an opportunity to run Head out at the keeper's end, plenty of time and at least two stumps to aim at. Misses
length ball around off, tapped towards cover from the back foot
length but too much width, Head latches on to it and cuts it hard through point. The deep-backward point had no chance
tossed up around off, pushed towards extra covers
flatter outside off, looks to go over mid-on, miscues but enough on it to clear the fielder. Boundary off the second ball of the over this time. Fifty comes up as well for the Strikers
looks to smash it down the ground once again but he's nowhere near the pitch of the ball and therefore fails to middle it. Cooper takes a couple of steps forward to his left and takes an easy catch
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover
length ball outside off, pushes forward but gets a thick outside edge past the slip fielder
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards midwicket
length ball at the batsman, defended from the back foot
length ball outside off, stays back and just steers it past short third man, races away for four
length ball angling in, Head looks to repeat the shot but misses
length outside off, cuts it again but this time it's much squarer and deep backward point cuts it off
length outside off, looks to push at it and gets beaten. Holds it line after landing
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but ends up hitting it onto his leg
fuller outside off, pushes it towards long-off
length outside off, goes for the cut but gets an outside edge. In the air but away from Samit Patel at short third man
tossed up around off and middle, comes forward and nudges it towards midwicket, the fielder is at the boundary and that allows the batsmen to come back for the second
slower, length outside off and spinning big, Wells had to really reach out for it to connect the pull
length around off, cuts it towards cover
fuller outside off, driven towards long-off
fuller around off, punched towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg
another cutter, outside off this time, Head cuts it past the diving cover fielder but there is a sweeper in place
fuller at the stumps, driven towards sweeper cover for another single
fuller on the pads and whipped away, finding the gap between the two fielders patrolling the square boundary
fuller outside off, looks to drive through covers but ends up under-edging it into the ground. Bounces towards the keeper
tossed up around off, skips down and pushes it towards long-on
floated well outside off, Head goes for the slog sweep but ends up top-edging it towards short fine leg, Mennie moves to his left and takes a tumbling catch
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down and pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, slower again. Driven inside out towards deep extra cover
tossed up around off, comes forward and pushes towards cover
flighted outside off, pushes away from the body, gets a thick outside edge towards short third man
beats him in the flight but the keeper misses the stumping chance. Was a length ball outside off, Nielsen was drawn forward but Harper failed to collect
pushed towards sweeper cover
length ball on middle and leg, turned behind square leg
uses his feet and drives but cannot beat extra cover
good stop by Samit at short third man. A reverse sweep to length ball, neat connection but Samit dives to his left to keep it to one
fuller around off, pushed towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, sweeps it towards short fine leg
a high full toss, comes down the track but fails to put it away, only a single to deep midwicket
length ball at the stumps, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, goes for the slog sweep but fails to middle. Toe end of the bat and a simple catch for Webster, well inside the deep midwicket boundary
length ball at the stumps, punched towards short midwicket where the fielder makes a diving stop to his left
slower outside off, pushes it towards sweeper cover
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
length ball around off, 77.1kph, pushed back towards the bowler
slower again, Wells uses his feet and drives it towards long-on
tossed up outside off, drives it through covers for one
length ball on the pads, looks to work on the leg side but misses, struck on the pads
slower again, just outside off, defended towards covers
fuller outside off, driven but straight towards extra cover
fuller outside off, flighted again, drives it towards the left of extra cover
length ball around off, stays back and turns it towards midwicket for a couple
length ball around off, goes back and cuts it towards deep-backward point
length ball around off, drops it on the off side and scampers to the other end
tossed up outside off, cuts it towards deep cover
length outside off, some extra bounce there. Short looks to hit it through the off side, misses
fuller around off, driven along the ground towards long-on
fuller around off once again, tucked away towards midwicket this time and they come back for the second
short on middle and leg, mistimes the pull towards midwicket
length ball around off, pushed towards mid-on from the back foot
length ball outside off, pushed towards deep extra cover
length ball around off, punched towards deep extra cover
length ball around off, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
length ball around off, looks to back away and force through the off side, a thick outside edge towards short third man
down the track but can manage to hit it towards long-on only, a couple of bounces to the fielder
length around off, stays back and forces it towards extra cover
finally a boundary! Goes back this time and pulls it from outside off over deep midwicket, was a touch short and the lack of pace allowed Short to rock back and smash it
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards backward square leg
slower one, fuller on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
down the track, Christian bangs it short but Wells adjusts and cuts it over point for four
slapped hard but straight towards sweeper cover, was a length ball outside off this time
a slower bouncer but too high. Short leaves it alone. Called a wide
fuller on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
a slower full toss on the leg side, tucked away towards midwicket
fuller outside off, uses his feet and pushes it towards extra cover
a low full toss outside off, pushes it towards the off side
tossed up outside off, cuts it square off the wicket, Webster moves to his left, gets low and stops it just inside
fuller but way outside off, cuts it behind point. Webster had no chance this time
fuller around off, turned away towards midwicket
a full toss at the batsman, but Short missed out. Was on the move but ends up mistiming it towards short fine leg
uses his feet to take it on the full, hits it towards long-on
looks to come down but Nabi bowls it extremely slow and shortens his length as well, cuts it towards backward point
a touch fuller outside off, hits it towards sweeper cover
slower again but this time too short, Wells rocks back and cuts it towards the deep cover boundary
another cut this time, Harris from backward point gets a hand to it. Two more to the total
short on middle and leg, goes back and cuts it towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, moves across and looks to hit behind square on the leg side. Misses
fuller outside off, looks to smash down the ground. A thick outside edge towards third man, well short of the fielder though
a juicy full toss outside off and given the treatment it deserved. Dispatched over deep midwicket
fuller and wider outside off, fails to get the bat on it
length ball outside off, walks towards the bowler and smashes it over deep midwicket, great connection
a full toss outside off, but taken from there and smashed to on the leg side, bisecting long-on and deep midwicket
fuller outside off, stays back and cuts it up over backward point
fuller on the stumps, punched towards long-on, Short is scampering back for the second but he was never going to make it, despite the dive and the throw being wide
a low full toss on the pads and helped over deep-backward square leg, gets to his fifty off 36 balls
short outside off, stays leg side of the ball and cuts it through point for four
fuller around off, goes deep and looks to target the deep midwicket region this time but doesn't get it from the middle of the bat. A regulation catch for Webster
a full toss outside off, hits it towards midwicket for a couple
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards long-off for one
length ball on middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket
length outside off, skips down, gives himself some room and smashes it through covers
a bit of leading edge towards cover-point this time as Harris was looking to work this length ball towards the leg side
loses his off stump this time. Was length ball at the off stump, Harris skips down, gives himself room and looks to smash it inside out, misses and the off stump is out of its groove
length ball on the pads from around the wicket, tucked away on the leg side
length outside off, moves across and lobs it up and over the keeper, Neser puts in the sprint from fine leg but cannot stop it
a yorker on the middle stump and the stumps are disturbed. Harper backs away this time and looks to hit it through the off side but misses. Renegades in a bit of trouble here
short of length outside off, scrambled seam. Webster looks to push at it and gets beaten
length ball around off, nudged towards third man
length ball around off and middle, defended towards cover-point
fuller outside off, looks to sweep, gets some glove on it and fine as well. Four to start the over with
uses his feet to work it towards midwicket
length outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat the point fielder
fuller on the pads, defends it on the leg side
a googly, pitching on the stumps and leaving the batsman, Marsh had no idea
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
length ball at the stumps punched back. Siddle stops it in his followthrough
short of length at the batsman, dabbed towards backward point
length ball at the stumps, mistimes the pull on the leg side, inner half and onto the leg
a crowd catch, fuller on the stumps, flicked into the ground and to Rashid at short midwicket
fuller around off, drives it between the non-striker and mid-off for four
fuller around off, goes aerial this time, didn't get it from the meat of the bat but enough to clear mid-off, back-to-back boundaries after four dots
length ball on the leg stump and picked up over backward square leg for four
length ball at the stumps, stays back and smashes it over deep square leg, miles into the stands
short of length outside off, stays back and punches it through cover-point for another four
a full toss on the pads, misses out this time. Mistimed towards deep midwicket for one
fuller outside off and creamed through extra cover, 19 from the over with one ball to go
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball around off, stays back and punches it towards the bowler
fuller on the pads, flicked in front of deep square leg
fuller and wider outside off, looks to hit it too hard and ends up playing over it
length but way down the leg side, sloppy from the keeper as well who lefts it through his legs
fuller on the stumps, finds mid-on with the flick
length ball outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball at the stumps, punched past the non-striker, Rashid looks to make the stop but slips while moving across
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, comes down the ground and looks to push on the leg side, misses and is rapped on the pads
a googly from outside off, Webster was looking to lap it fine, exposing his stumps. The ball just misses the off stump
skips down and works this length ball towards square leg
fuller on the pads, clipped away towards midwicket
fuller around off, pushed towards long-off
down the track but Head shortens his length, flicked in front of square leg
length outside off, late-cuts it towards short third man
down the track and digs it out towards long-on
length ball around middle and leg, pushed towards the right of Head who makes a sliding stop
length ball angling across, Marsh looks to hit it on the up, fails to connect
length again, just outside off, goes for the pull but misses again
length ball on the pads, looks to pull it fine but no connection once more. Hit on the thigh
length ball around off, looks to cut but ends up chopping into the ground, dribbles towards point
length outside off, good pace and bounce, another play-and-miss
short of length at the batsman, pushes it towards midwicket, just that solitary single from the over
length ball on the pads, misses the flick
Head fetches the reward for all the pressure Agar created in the last over. Marsh skips down and ends up yorking himself, loses his middle stump
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
fuller on the pads, and clipped fine, short fine leg puts in the chase to keep it to two
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball around off, goes back and across and turns it towards square leg
length ball on middle and leg, helped behind square leg
length ball on middle and leg once again, Webster goes for the pull and gets right, over deep-backward square leg for a six
fuller around off, flicked in front of square leg
length ball around off, pushed towards backward point
length ball around off, tucked toward short midwicket
that jumps off from a length to surprise Nabi and hit him on the glove
down the track but Head shortens his length, flicked towards deep square leg
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
length but way down the leg side, Webster looks to give it his all but it beats him as well as the keeper
fuller around off, hit hard but back towards the bowler
uses his feet and clips it towards wide long-on for a couple of runs
uses of feet again, hits it straight towards long-on this time
fuller on the stumps, sweeps it towards short fine leg
length ball at the stumps, defended on the off side from the back foot
fuller outside off, mistimes the slog sweep towards the right of long-on
uses his feet and drives it towards long-off

a brilliant catch from Siddle, running to his right and tumbling in the end. Nabi looked to heave it over deep midwicket, got a top edge towards backward point, Siddle sprinted from short third man to complete the catch
a low full toss outside off, smashes it towards long-on, beats the man at the boundary for four
length, way outside off, goes for the cut but misses
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
short of length and slapped towards midwicket for one
fuller outside off, looks to go over long-off but miscues it towards sweeper cover where Wells takes a comfortable catch
length outside off, opens the face of the bat for a single to third man
fuller around off, pushes at it but straight towards backward point
a googly, fuller on the stumps. Webster misses the flick and is struck right in front. Up goes the finger and Webster falls one short of fifty. Would have gone on to hit the leg stump in my opinion
another wrong'un. Goes back and flicks it towards backward square leg
fuller around off, pushes it back towards the bowler
googly again, goes back and cuts it towards cover
a leg break, sharp and spinning away, Samit cannot connect the cut
fuller around off, nudges it towards long-on
length ball outside off, gives himself a bit room, waits for it before cutting it past point
short of length at the batsman, mistimes the pull towards short midwicket
length outside off, backs away and cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, hits it inside out towards mid-off for a quick single
short of length at the batsman, looks to swat away but gets an inside edge over the stumps. One boucne to the keeper
short and pulled towards deep square leg this time
fuller around off, drilled towards mid-off
pitched up on the stumps, backs away and flicks but ends up hitting straight to Weatherald at short midwicket
length ball around off, punched towards mid-off for a quick single
fuller outside off, looks to play a sweep but misses
fuller around off, hits it towards mid-off
slower one around off, lofted towards long-off where Neser charges in, puts in the slide and takes it with reverse cups
a slow full toss on the pads, tucked away towards backward square leg
pins him in front with the slower full toss this time, Wildermuth looks to hit it on the leg side but is deceived by the lack of pace
another slower one, but down the leg side, brushes the pads and beats short fine leg
short of length down the leg side, helps it towards fine leg but has decided to come back for the second, well short of his crease as Nielsen collects the throw and breaks the stumps
